channel.title: E3 2009
channel.description:
So guys, I'd like to hear your thoughts and expectations about the upcoming E3 this year.
It seems it's going to be an exciting couple of days in the L.A. Convention Center, with a lot more announcements than last year (I'm not even halfway through the pre-E3 blowout at GTTV/Spike). My personal hopes are for hearing more info on games such as Assassin's Creed 2, Brutal Legend, Thi4f, [i]especially[/i] on Alan Wake, and others such as Batman Arkham Asylum, BGaE2 and Halo: ODST to a lesser extent (OK, just kidding on that last one). I'll be keeping an eye for Bioshock/Mass Effect/Modern Warfare 2 info too, despite not really being into those franchises. I'm also interested in Microsoft's conference; I think they have a few tricks up their sleeve to show us this year, the rumored motion controller to compete with Nintendo's WiiMote/Motion+/whatever line of products, anything they have to show really - they're bound to bring something new on the table on E3.
I'm also interested in the new announcments in this year's expo. I've just heard about Brink, Bethesda's new role-playi-- I mean game, just game, I'm sure it's gonna be a FPS. :3 And, of course:
[b]VALVE, MOTHERFUCKERS, ANNOUNCE EPISODE 3 ALREADY![/b]
So, how about you?
PS: I just had the idea of creating the thread and then I saw your post on the GT trailers thread, blue, so... here you go! ^_^[/SIZE]

item.title: E3 2009
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
At this year’s E3 Event. Crackdown 2 was confirmed.

I’ve always been waiting for this…

https://uk.gamespot.com/news/blogs/sidebar/909182374/26913875/crackdown-2-four-player-co-op-confirmed.html
Trailer at the bottom of the page.

SPOILER OF THE PLOT BELOW.

Basically this is a rumour of the plot. The guy who invented the ‘Freaks’ in Crackdown 1 had people following in his work. And they sent people to blow up the Agency Building, and you wouldn’t be able to respawn, So you’d die. So the Agency prevented all of the tower from blowing up, But you could never use the same human form again (Crackdown 1 Player Models) So you have new player models and You are a new person. The followers have infected people and they are evolved freaks. You are the Agent. Your job is to sort this mess out.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2009
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
For me, the whole E3 was for the trash bin, because I really expected to see something about Ep3. I am just disappointed.

Jesus Christ. When do these ignorant kids begin to understand that E3 is NOT all about games…

P.S. I laughed my ass out so hard reading comments while watching Sony E3 conference live at gametrailers:
“STOP TALKING NUMBERS SHOW GOD OF WAR”
“PSP GO BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORING SHOW GOD OF WAR”
“SONY SUCKS NO ONE CARES HOW MANY UNITS DID YOU SELL THIS E3 IS FAILURE SHOW GOD OF WAR”

fucking idiots and typing whores

item.title: E3 2009
item.dc:creator: InterloperX
item.description:
I find it hard to respect a video game producing company that has such incredibly terrible taste in the music they put in their games. Not to mention being uncompromising when it comes to releasing games, notably far before they’re properly polished.

NHL 09 and Fight Night Round 3 are amazing games though.
